name: Blas Oronoz
title: Creative Director - Solution Architect
description: Blas Oronoz is a creative director and solution architect with more than ten years of experience in the digital industry. As a digital nomad, he has worked with clients in many areas; from travel services to music production to gastronomy, sports and events. His passion is to create solutions that are intuitive, easy to use, and easy to understand, with a background in design and software development and a strong belief in the power of creativity. He is an active member of the Interactive Design Foundation.
